scripts.podman:build:
pnpm run-script-if --bool $([ $(command -v podman) ] && echo true || echo false) --then "podman build --ulimit nofile=5000:5000 $(echo $(build-env swfSandbox.baseImage.buildTags) | xargs printf -- "-t $(build-env swfSandbox.baseImage.registry)/$(build-env swfSandbox.baseImage.account)/$(build-env swfSandbox.baseImage.name):%s
" | xargs echo) --build-arg QUARKUS_PLATFORM_VERSION=$(build-env swfSandbox.baseImage.quarkusVersion) -f Containerfile" --else "echo Podman not found, skipping image build."
scripts.build:prod: pnpm cleanup && pnpm copy:assets && pnpm install:mvnw && run-script-os
